title: Scalars and vectors - velocity and acceleration

content.question: A cart moves along a straight, level track. At time <math alttext="t equals 0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>, the cart has a speed of <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> to the right. At time <math alttext="t equals 1 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>, the cart has a speed of <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> to the left. Which of the following correctly describes the magnitude and direction of the change <math alttext="delta vector v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><mover accent="true"><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></mstyle></math> in the cart’s velocity between <math alttext="t equals 0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math> and <math alttext="t equals 1 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub 1, plus v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math> to the right

<math alttext="v sub 1, plus v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math> to the left

<math alttext="the absolute value of v sub 1, minus v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mstyle></math> to the right

<math alttext="the absolute value of v sub 1, minus v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></mstyle></math> to the left
